title: Provides that photos used on a driver's license may not be more than 8 years old
summary: Provides that the photograph used on a driver's license shall not be more than 8 years old.

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to photo images
         used on driver's licenses

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-

    6  license  is suspended, revoked or cancelled. Such license may be renewed
    7  by submission of an application for renewal, the fee prescribed by  law,

   12  PHOTO  IMAGE  USED ON THE DRIVER'S LICENSE IS MORE THAN EIGHT YEARS OLD.
   13  In addition, an applicant for renewal of a license containing a  hazard-
   14  ous  material  endorsement  shall  pass  an  examination  to retain such
   15  endorsement. The commissioner shall, with respect to the  renewal  of  a
   16  hazardous  materials  endorsement,  comply with the requirements imposed
   17  upon states by sections 383.141 and 1572.13 of title 49 of the  code  of

   21  provisions of section five hundred sixteen of  this  title,  and  except
